Description:
Detects potentially highly relevant antivirus events in the application log based on known virus signature names and malware keywords.


Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Arnim Rupp
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Relevant Anti-Virus Signature Keywords In Application Log
Query: sourcetype='windows-application' eql select * from _source_ where ((log like '%adfind%' or log like '%asp/backdoor %' or log like '%atk/%' or log like '%backdoor.asp%' or log like '%backdoor.cobalt%' or log like '%backdoor.jsp%' or log like '%backdoor.php%' or log like '%blackworm%' or log like '%brutel%' or log like '%bruter%' or log like '%chopper%' or log like '%cobalt%' or log like '%cobeacon%' or log like '%cometer%' or log like '%cryptes%' or log like '%cryptor%' or log like '%destructor%' or log like '%dumpcreds%' or log like '%exploit.script.cve%' or log like '%fastreverseproxy%' or log like '%filecoder%' or log like '%grandcrab %' or log like '%hacktool%' or log like '%hktl%' or log like '%htool-%' or log like '%/htool%' or log like '%.htool%' or log like '%iisexchgspawncmd%' or log like '%impacket%' or log like '%jsp/backdoor %' or log like '%keylogger%' or log like '%koadic%' or log like '%krypt%' or log like '%lazagne%' or log like '%metasploit%' or log like '%meterpreter%' or log like '%metetool%' or log like '%mikatz%' or log like '%mimikatz%' or log like '%mpreter%' or log like '%msfshell%' or log like '%nighthawk%' or log like '%packed.generic.347%' or log like '%pentestpowershell%' or log like '%phobos%' or log like '%php/backdoor %' or log like '%potato%' or log like '%powersploit%' or log like '%powerssh%' or log like '%pshlspy%' or log like '%pswtool%' or log like '%pwcrack%' or log like '%pwdump%' or log like '%ransom%' or log like '%rozena%' or log like '%ryzerlo%' or log like '%sbelt%' or log like '%seatbelt%' or log like '%securitytool %' or log like '%sharpdump%' or log like '%shellcode%' or log like '%sliver%' or log like '%splinter%' or log like '%swrort%' or log like '%tescrypt%' or log like '%teslacrypt%' or log like '%turtleloader%' or log like '%valyria%' or log like '%webshell%') and  not ((log like '%anti_ransomware_service.exe%' or log like '%anti-ransomware%' or log like '%crack%' or log like '%cyber-protect-service.exe%' or log like '%encryptor%' or log like '%keygen%') or level = '4' or provider_name = 'microsoft-windows-restartmanager'))
